allow: Bash(powershell -Command "Get-Process python -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Stop-Process -Force; Write-Host ''All Python processes killed''")
Bash(powershell -Command "Get-Process python -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Stop-Process -Force; Write-Host ''Python processes killed''")

Bash(powershell -Command "Get-Process python -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Stop-Process -Force; Get-Process node -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Stop-Process -Force; Write-Host ''All servers stopped''")
Bash(powershell -Command "Get-Process python -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Stop-Process -Force; Write-Host ''Python processes stopped''")
